title: ICT-Based Oral Health Education: Dental Caries Prevention and Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic oral health management knowledge and foundational pedagogy
context.additional_context: Blended Instructional Design Using Smartphone-Centric ICT Tools for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers, Emphasizing Interaction and Project-Based Assessment via Web 2.0/3.0 Technologies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mechanisms of dental caries development and preventive methods based on scientific evidence
Learners can design oral health education scenarios following the ERCA methodology (Experience-Reflection-Conceptualization-Application)
Learners can create student-engagement-focused instructional materials using smartphone-based ICT tools (quiz apps, collaboration platforms, etc.)
Learners can develop and present community-tailored oral health education programs through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
